website_summaries.verdict: Choosy hamsters and gerbils, rejoice. The Fiesta food mixture is loaded with an assortment of deliciously healthy bits, including raisins, papaya, bananas, peas, apples, and so much more.
pros: Corn, oats, and wheat are the first 3 ingredients
A buffet of yummy seeds, fruits, vegetables, and grains
Promotes digestive, eye, and heart health
cons: Although Fiesta is packed with appetizing pieces and vitamins, the artificial coloring isn’t needed

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and they are both what is in the picture shown (Same package, same food assortment, same 4.5 pound bags). The reason I took a star was because one of the 2 bags had a rip or cut in it and some of the food was spilled in the box. I just taped the front of the bag. Other than that they are what I purchased. *I put a remote in the picture so you can see how big the bags are.
customer_reviews.author: Toobs

customer_reviews.title: Food infested with tiny bugs.
customer_reviews.text: This was completely infested with tiny bugs. I had to change the entire hamster habitat, bleach and clean everything in the room, call the exterminator, and I may possibly have to take my hamsters to the vet. I had already fed my hamsters a hand full of food before I noticed the bugs the next day. Horrified that purchasing this food could hurt my hamsters.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality food
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great mixture, my gerbil is a fussy bugger so he doesn't eat many of the tiny seeds only the larger ones like pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds.... basically all the larger stuff which they are only supposed to have a limited amount of so cannot be fed solely the larger things. May try to take the little seeds and make a granola bar type bar for him as he seems to eat them in this form when purchased at the pet store. Still a great product and may work great for those with gerbils who like the little seeds as this is much of the mix.
customer_reviews.author: C. Choquette

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when I realized my hamsters were low, and roads weren't great... It was cheaper than the pet store and the grocery store, and I didn't have to leave my house, which was nice. I have two hamsters, and both seem to like this food more than the last stuff that I picked. Perhaps it is more fresh? Either way, I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bag is too small. I thought it would be a larger amount that would last. I'm almost done with the bag in only 2 times I've given some of this mixed with their other foods. I use the scoop spoons that comes in a baby cereal container to add it to the milk. Its smell amazing I have to say, if you like peanuts, they don't eat the Rose's part tho. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: carolFer

customer_reviews.title: Gerbils approve
customer_reviews.text: So I feel slightly strange reviewing gerbil food lol but I do have to say that our gerbils seem to like this better than the other brand we fed them that I was purchasing at a store and this is cheaper so it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Weasley

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves this, so I gave this a 5-star rating on Flavor. Why do they ask us about the flavor of pet foods? Meh. Anyway, this is a good value, for the price, I got twice as much food as the bag in the pet store. And this is a very colorful and varied food - which I think is essential to these little critters - to give them a varied diet. So I will definitely purchase again, but I think with a 4.5 lb bag, my one hamster is set for quite awhile. :)
customer_reviews.author: Uncaged Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: My hamster seems to enjoy the new variety
customer_reviews.text: My winter white hamster picks on it, she didn’t like the rose petals, those looked super dry to me so I don’t blame her. She does like the other stuff in there especially the sunflower seeds. Good for treats but not a replacement for daily nutrition. Doesn’t come in a big bag but likes like quality product. Maybe worth the money if you have it as a treat. Good amount of variety so I think hamster approves.
customer_reviews.author: Fun2have2

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not good quality!
customer_reviews.text: The kaytee hamster food is cheap but lower quilty than my expect. The seeds are empty and only have shell on it. After opening for 2 months, it start to have small bugs inside, which can no longer be able to use. I keep it in dry and cool area seperately by itself. So I am sure the small bugs come from itself. Also before I found the insects, my hamster didn't like it too. Just take it for basic needs. Not recommend for pets~
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and variety.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy and should last 2-3 months for a hamster. Our Syrian hamster loves the variety. We watch him daily search for what he needs to store for later. It has an excellent variety of food in it. We’ve found our hamster doesnt eat the small seeds or the long circular items. So there is a good bit of waste in the bag. I’d say 1/3 of the bag gets thrown to the birds vs hamster eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Kinko mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hamster
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loved forging for these. I sprinkled it all into her bedding and in the morning I found all of it neatly stacked in the corner of her cage. I am happy to have given her something fun to do.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: my hamster loves it
customer_reviews.text: My hamster Honey is enjoying this batch of food much more than the other hamster food. His favorite has to be those peanut sesame balls, he's always stuffing them in his cheeks first and storing them separately from the rest of the food. He hasn't been picky and left any food behind. Overall this is a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Vy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Way better than other brand!
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using a different brand and noticed that my hamsters would eat but leave half a bowl of pellets. So I switched to Katee Fiesta and noticed a difference right away. I posted a video that I took 2 weeks before this review. Not only did I see a difference by my hamsters clean the bowl completely! Clear win for me!
customer_reviews.author: JulieP

customer_reviews.title: Bag open and everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The food came in a box with other stuff I ordered and when we picked up the box it was leaving a trail of hamster food. There’s a 2 inch opening in the bag and the box was filled with the food. Disappointed as we’re completely out of food now and don’t know how long the bags been open. It’s unsettling that so many reviewers have this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Hammy thinks it is delicious
customer_reviews.text: My little hammy gobbles it up. Fun for picking sunflower seeds out and feeding it to him. They go nuts for any and all nuts found in this bag. Will purchase again, but this bag is so huge I don't see myself having to re-up any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jayremy

customer_reviews.title: Best Hamster food
customer_reviews.text: Best Hamster Food, My Robo Hamster “ Harryette” loves this nutricious food,huge bag, very low cost, possibly half or even a quarter of the costs in My local Pet Stores, and came very fast by Amazon shipping, it even expires next year of March which is another superb record in My experience deal!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kobashigawa

customer_reviews.title: Good food for my hamster
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy from local store but this bag was Larger and the same quality and price. I am very happy buying remotely and it is a really large bag compared to what I get at the local pet store. I would buy again. I have no clue how it tastes or if it's fresh but it was sealed well and appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: glenC

customer_reviews.text: It's a fiesta for my Syrian, he's abandoned normative behaviors such as stockpiling food in different places in his tank. This stuff tells him that life is good, that everything is going to be alright, that the future is bright, that he's all covered by his HamDaddy, that he's wuved.
customer_reviews.author: Kawah John Liang

customer_reviews.title: Large quantities for the money
customer_reviews.text: Huge bag of food, but our hamsters is not a big fan for the pellets, she like the seed very much. But it is just her preference, unfortunately, there are not too many seeds. For the quantity of food, I’d still give 5 star overall.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great amount for the price!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite brands, a great amount/size for the price! The bag also has a ziplock closure which is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Marji D.

customer_reviews.title: Hamster Seems to Enjoy the Variety
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster definitely picks through to find his favorite pieces, but I don’t mind... it’s not much waste and he seems to enjoy the process. We’ve had this bag for 3 months and are barely halfway through.
customer_reviews.author: Mom on the Move

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of snacks
customer_reviews.text: Bag busted open during shipping but the rats LOVE this stuff. And for 5$ you can’t beat it. It has one of the best variety’s of different things in it that I’ve been able to find. The tropical bonanza and animal planet mix were the only ones that beat it. And those are hard to find now.
customer_reviews.author: tommy ohlrich

customer_reviews.title: Good value if jammies will eat it
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are way too big for my robo and neither Syrian will eat it. The bag is large and a good value for the amount you get but unfortunately my the babies won't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Pooplets
customer_reviews.text: My hamster wasn't getting the proper nutrition with the previous Kaytee food he was eating. He acted happy enough but his droppings were green so I switched to this and that is no longer a problem
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Edgel

customer_reviews.title: Great staple that's been around for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: This food has been around for years! I remember feeding this brand to my gerbils as a kid with great results. My boys have all lived 3-5 years on this food. I had been using a "higher end" brand of gerbil food but you just can't beat this price for the value.
customer_reviews.author: KayB

customer_reviews.title: Good hamster food
customer_reviews.text: Lasts for a long time and both if my robo hamsters love it. There are lots of vitamins and nutrients and it has a good variety of seeds and snacks for a healthy diet
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Luck

customer_reviews.title: Gerbils didn't really seem to like it any more then regular food
customer_reviews.text: I thought this gerbil food would be a special treat to get excited about. Our gerbils really didn't seem to like it anymore then their regular food.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice large bag of food that I got for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice large bag of food that I got for my gerbils. I love the variety of different seeds and pellet foods in it so that they are getting proper nutrition. This large bag will probably last my 2 gerbils forever.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Orangic and great smelling amazing snacks for healthy hamsters!
customer_reviews.text: These treats smell literally like roses and my chubby teddys love them ♥️♥️ Great amount of snacks for the amount paid...I’m very satisfied 😍
customer_reviews.author: onesha

customer_reviews.title: My preferred gerbil food
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety in this particular brand. Lots of dried fruits and vegetables plus grains. Not filled with a bunch of BS. The gerbs love it too! Plenty here to last several months for a two-gerbil house.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to food
customer_reviews.text: This mix has everything you need. We've been feeding this brand/type to my daughter's hamster for his whole life and it seems to be serving him very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great Mix!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this mix! I checked online to make sure all was okay to feed to my Chubby and very happy that not only is there good stuff but little bits of sweet treats, too! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My teddy bear hamster loves this food. There is a real selection of different seeds etc. I think the hamster finds it much more interesting to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Dolan-Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Junk food
customer_reviews.text: This product does not carry the needed nutrients for a Hamster. It has "goodies" that they love and will eat without eating any nutrients. Do yourself and your hamster a favor, feed them quality food without the treats in their bowl and keep the treats for training and playtime. This will save your pets life.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Robo Hamsters LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Our two robo hamsters LOVE this food! They never showed excitement over their old food, but this one the absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Hammy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Hammy loves all the tasty seeds. He won't touch the pellets, but that is because he's stinkin spoiled. Anyway, hammy is over 3.5 years old, so the food is quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is always the brand that we buy for my girls hamsters. Quality is great! Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wagenbach

customer_reviews.title: Best Around
customer_reviews.text: The best hamster food by far that I have been able to find. It has a ton of great stuff in it that she loves
customer_reviews.author: Deckers

customer_reviews.title: Mojo "Blink" Approved
customer_reviews.text: Using as a "topping mix" for my hamsters regular food. First try out today and she definitely found so bits to pouch an take back to her nest an save for later
customer_reviews.author: Ivie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Randy likes it
customer_reviews.text: I'm assuming the flavor is tasty because our hamster Sir Randy Hampton has not had any complaints and he eats all the different morsels in there.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I don't eat it but the gerbil loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my daughters pet alive! Guess that is a good thing! :) Seems decent enough quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Waters

customer_reviews.title: Supplement source
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy as the main source of food. This can be a supplement food. I use 1tsp of this and fill the rest of the dish with The Power Of 5 made by All Living Things (hamster and gerbil diet) Also check in their hut regularly, they like to hoard food in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked good in the package
customer_reviews.text: Didnt get much use of it because sadly my Syrian needed to be put down three days after opening the bag.
customer_reviews.author: laynie D

customer_reviews.title: great treats for my hamster
customer_reviews.text: My hamster really likes these little treats. Lots of seeds and berries and nuts.
customer_reviews.author: reads a lot

customer_reviews.title: Gerbils and hamsters love this!
customer_reviews.text: Both my gerbils and hamsters eat and love this. I've tried other foods as well, but this mix has been unanimously voted their favorite
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Our hempster is happy & healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Our hempster has been eating this for a year now. He likes it! & He is healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ocean

customer_reviews.title: We buy this stuuf is good
customer_reviews.text: We Buy this stuff for our hamster, is good she likes it, keep the cage clean
customer_reviews.author: David A. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Moths....
customer_reviews.text: I never had a problem with Kaytee before, but my most recent purchase had moths and moth eggs inside. Upon further research I found out that this is a relatively common problem with this brand/food. I do not recommend this product, it could just be the warehouses they store the food in but I am just gonna stick with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marek Ellmann

customer_reviews.title: Ginger loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My son's hamster, Ginger, was trained using these treats! She comes on to my son's hand (or my hand) and gets her treats! She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: shylyne710

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great mix of food for hamsters! Our birds even enjoy some lol
customer_reviews.author: KATHY ORLOWSKI

customer_reviews.title: There was blood smeared on my package I recieved today 😐
customer_reviews.text: This product is good and my hamsters enjoy it but when I recieved my product today there was blood smeared on the back. I'm assuming an employee cut themselves and handled my package after. During these times that's pretty concerning for me 😒
customer_reviews.author: Shawna💖

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils will officially eat nothing else lol they love this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennaj

customer_reviews.title: Hamster approved
customer_reviews.text: Hamster approved, but he hates the alfalfa and throws it onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Dyes
customer_reviews.text: Kinda sketchy food. We gave it to our ham and a few days after that we noticed red on the bedding. We thought our hamster was injured, when in reality it was dye coming off of the food and onto the bedding. We took it away from him and are regretting getting a 5lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hs17

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster is so picky and loves this food. Easy to feed and a good variety for her.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value.
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils love this food and one bag lasts me forever.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Zuerlein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hamster Food
customer_reviews.text: My hamster didn’t really like his old food that were ball shaped then I decided to order this and he seems to really like them. I like how it has many different types of food into one. Would recommend the food because it is very delicious for them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Monsurez

customer_reviews.title: Hamster Food
customer_reviews.text: Nice size bag and my hamster seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Hamster goodness
customer_reviews.text: Since the hamster ate it up I guess it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Josef Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Hope to improve food
customer_reviews.text: My hamster only eat half of the food the other half she never likes it
customer_reviews.author: SKY

customer_reviews.title: My hamsters seemed to like this but it's full of a lot of millet ...
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters seemed to like this but it's full of a lot of millet seeds that they leave behind.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: uh...no?
customer_reviews.text: No no no and no upon opening this bag of food seemed fine....suddenly its spawning pantry moths and webs.... this is not okay to feed my hamsters....i would really like a refund....
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great prices for it. Our little hampster buddie loves it, plus they have amazing customer service
customer_reviews.author: maria c.

customer_reviews.title: One of our gerbils' favorites
customer_reviews.text: We tried gerbil treats from 3 different vendors, and this was one of their favorites!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: To expensive
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if it was not so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Puffyfish

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different shapes and textures
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different shapes and texture. Both hamsters seem to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not for dwarf hampsters.
customer_reviews.text: I have two dwarf hampsters, and they only eat the sunflowerseed and pumpkin seed in this foodmix.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: My Gerbils love it!
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils love this mix. I guess you can call them spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My hamster loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My hamster stores this food all over the place, and in his cheeks like a chipmunk. :) I guess he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for Flavor, not sure how it tastes but my daughters hamster loves it. Five stars from Teddy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Breder

customer_reviews.title: Good food...and lots of it
customer_reviews.text: Way more food than I actually thought so the value is really worth it. My guy loves it and I have enough for a really long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Uh... the bag is TINY and not even a third of the way full. Like are you serious?
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: My hamster loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: The price is great for the amount you get. My hamster loves this food.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Clusters of feed, damaged package
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hamster. The package has a small hole on it. I think this hole might had affected the quality of the feed because I found clustered feed and twigs inside. Since I was out of feed so I fed a little of it to my hamster. Not sure if the feed is still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Yuyang

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo worth it
customer_reviews.text: Still have two more bags was a super good deal on three lage bags of hamster food
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Great food. We like to pick out the pumpkin seeds as treats my sons hammy loves them.
customer_reviews.author: someguy

customer_reviews.title: My hamsters wake up just to run over and eat ...
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters wake up just to run over and eat this brand. The variety of seeds is outstanding. I will buy again for sure. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gift or treat for hamster's
customer_reviews.text: My hamster love it. Nice litte treat of gift for a person you know who loves a small pet.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra rose

customer_reviews.title: Best hamster food!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the BEST hamster food I’ve ever bought. The ingredients compared to other similar food brands is incomparable. Every single one of my hamsters LOVES this food and I will never buy another brand again. 🙏🏼👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good order and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived broken with two cuts on each end. Therefore, the food spilled all over the box that contained other items in it. Otherwise good order and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: My new hamster likes it
customer_reviews.text: Based on the review, I bought this food for my new hamster, and he seems to like it and eats alot each day.
customer_reviews.author: DaOne

customer_reviews.title: Holes in packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to get this but when it came in the mail. it has these holes! There was on big one on the top and 2 holes on each corner on the bottom. Very disappointed. i’m not sure if i should feed this to my hamster! i will never buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: kissandra

customer_reviews.title: HAMSTER IS IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: MY HAMSTER ABSOLUTELY LOVES THIS FOOD . I BOUGHT THE DIET ONE BEFORE THIS WAS MY FIRST TIME PURCHASING THE FIESTA FOOD. AND HE INSTALLY WENT TO HIS FOOD BOWL TO EAT. HES IN LOVE LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Package open and all over!!!
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived opened and all over inside the box. Not happy less than 1/2 the bag left
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer1038

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional, pets love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, more variety then plain old hampster food. Our hampster love it...just wished it was a larger bag :)
customer_reviews.author: knightreigner

customer_reviews.title: Pet Food
customer_reviews.text: It is pet food. Not sure what to say other than it arrived and the hamster eats it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great hamster foood
customer_reviews.text: My hamsters (robos) love these. They like the size, the flavor, and everything about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Liang

customer_reviews.title: Our Hamster seems to love this mix
customer_reviews.text: Our Hamster seems to love this mix. However, we need to have more sunflower seeds. Those are his favorites. Will buy again when we need more food.
customer_reviews.author: ASPC

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My gerbils seem to be happy with this food. They'll eat almost all of the types of pieces in it.
customer_reviews.author: riittle

customer_reviews.title: Be aware, PEANUTS are in this treat mix.
customer_reviews.text: Hamster is happy with this treat but it is NOT safe for an owner with a peanut allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelynred

customer_reviews.title: Teddy Bear Hamster likes it
customer_reviews.text: It's far cheaper than anything you will get at the pet store. My hamster seems to like it, so that's great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Eng

customer_reviews.title: PANTRY MOTHS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This food had pantry moth eggs in it and later grew into 7 moths + larvae... DO NOT BUY and if you do make sure you keep it sealed in a plastic container
customer_reviews.author: CSV22

customer_reviews.title: It had a hole in it but
customer_reviews.text: anything major the hole was this size of a quarter but it's ok and it's a good amount of food for the price
customer_reviews.author: c.varner

customer_reviews.title: Great amount for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: It's the best bedding I've ever used for my hamster and it's the best amount for your money. Love this product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Haily Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of different seeds
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of different seeds. My dwarf hamster love it with an exception of few. Large bag and with every penny.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan imeltchouk

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can reseal the bag! My hamster son loves his food!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Barron

customer_reviews.title: Choose a veterinarian-recommended brand if you truly care for your pet.
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Oxbow Essentials to Kaytee Fiesta and noticed negative changes in my hamster. About a week after she started eating this, she began acting sluggish and began losing fur. I decided to discontinue the Fiesta and go back to Oxbow. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter G.

customer_reviews.title: The only food my hamster will eat
customer_reviews.text: This is the only feed that my hamster will actually eat. I have tried other brands, but she simply does not like them. This food smells great & it has a lot of different things for her to eat instead of just seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Healthy mix but my hamster did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: My hamster did not like this snack mix but my roommate's hamster did
customer_reviews.author: Erica L Dean

customer_reviews.title: Bag Broken!
customer_reviews.text: I like the food for my hamster but bag I received was broken; therefore, I lost a decent amount of the food! As a broke college student I need every penny’s worth :(
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

product_meta.title: Kaytee Fiesta Hamster and Gerbil Food
product_meta.description: Size:4.5 lb| Style:Fiesta Hamster & Gerbil FoodKaytee Fiesta Hamster and Gerbil food is a nutritionally fortified gourmet diet made of a premium blend of fruits, vegetables, seeds and grains offering maximum variety, fun and nutrition for small animals. Fiesta contains prebiotics and probiotics to support digestive health and is formulated with your small animal species in mind. Kaytee understands that sharing your life with a pet bird is not only enjoyable but very enriching. Kaytee shows our love by ensuring we provide your pet with the best nutrition for a long and healthy life. With over 150 years of nutritional experience, it's no wonder why Kaytee is at the heart of every healthy feeding routine.
feature_bullets: Shapes And Textures Support Dental Health Through Natural Chewing Activity
Prebiotics And Probiotics To Support Digestive Health
